Will dust pan handle remain in upright position while using instead of continually failing down? Yes,dustpan locks into place. Stays upright when using it. Why won't my dustpan stand up straight?the length of the handles? It should if you gently push it back in place. Mine was a little reluctant at first but with a gentle push it went into a flat open position. 52" tall of broom,38" tall for dustpan Is the Brush angled? Is it great for corners? Yes, it is angled and I find it does corners quite well. The bristles are frim but flexiable,the performance is very good. How does the Built in scraper and comb/Teeth work? After sweeping, put the broom near the teeth and pull up. Any hair or fiber on the broom bristles will stay at the teeth and falls into the pan leaving the broom clean and ready. How wide is the dustpan when it is folded down for storing？ then length of the handle after assembling 11-1/4” wide,the broom handle up to 52" with dustpan 38.5" handle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This broom & dustpan combo came securely packaged. One has to screw pieces of the handle together. This is great because one can also disassemble & store it for transport. I liked it so well I decided to purchase 3.It is lightweight but durable. The plastic despite heavy use has not cracked, nor has the portions of the handle one screws together to assemble it unscrewed once screwed together. It has little plastic teeth in the dust pan that can be used to remove objects from the brush part of the broom. The handle is also tall which is helpful. I find many brooms too short.It has a soft firm brush which gets up most particles. I did prefer an older broom I had with finer softer particles for cleaning up fine dust but this one is more durable and good enough. The brush on this one has not bent or lost its shape.I think it is a good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for pet hair
reviews.reviewText: Easy assembly only a few pieces. I was pleasantly surprised it came with a warranty. Picks up dirt and pet hair like a dream! We have a Pitsky- he she’d like his husky side- and it’s the solution we have been looking for. A regular broom puts too much hair back into the air to fall back down. This silicone broom grabs the hair much nicer and makes cleaning so much easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Mine has lasted a couple of years, very durable. Works well and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Small but perfectly able to do its job. I have stopped reaching for larger broom and dust pan although they are beautifully made. This is a more modern design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's not Libman, but it's my new favorite!
reviews.reviewText: I am a firm believer in Libman products... I had two awesome Libman brooms and I loved them.One day my husband was sweeping up his mess and saw a spider, breaking my favorite broom to kill it. It snapped at the bottom threads (where the broom and stick meet) and I was left with a jagged broomstick and a cracked hand broom.We bought this as a replacement. I will never bend down to sweep up ever again! I love the teeth on the dustpan and the long handle. I love that the dustpan snaps into place and can stand on its own. I frequently unscrew half of the broomstick to use as a short broom for cat litter and cleaning the air intake vent for the AC. I got the one with the yellow trim so I can see when the dustpan and bristles need cleaning. The only thing I would change is the sturdiness of the bristles. When putting the broom inside the dustpan for storage, it almost always has a few bristles that get bent upwards and end up sticking out away from the rest. A slightly bigger pan would fix that. Other than that, I love my new favorite broom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this broom and dust pan
reviews.reviewText: I have a small kitchen so this little broom and dust pan is perfect for what little room I have! very durable and easy to put together! I use my other broom that I had outside for keeping my porch clean of dirt and debris!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s more pull, not push
reviews.reviewText: I got this broom to sweep my tiled floors. I was very excited to receive it but the first time I went to use it I could not push the broom across my floor. I had to crouch down low to get it to move. It would be very useful when scrubbing floors while wet and with soap. If your floors are dry, the broom will just stop. But, it works very well to scrub floors while soapy and wet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great and price wasn’t bad
La mejor compra, la escoba súper suave, el recogedor se pega súper bien al piso para levantar Todo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sweep but a little heavy
reviews.reviewText: Broom sweeps extremely well but is a little heavy even in the short handle option. Very solid and robust set.

reviews.reviewTitle: Me encanta mi escoba y recogedor
reviews.reviewText: Es un poco caro, pero el diseño es muy bueno. También es práctica porque cabe en cualquier lado. Lo único malo es que no he encontrado repuesto para la escoba y no cualquiera le queda.
Reçu en bonne en bonne état et très sactifait

The broom and dustpan was delivered in an undamaged carton. However when the dustpan was removed the lip was warped and you could not sweep debris into the pan. The plastic is cheap, flimsy and overall poor quality.
